GE07mbh_08_u:591: 08,006.042d*0075_03 duryodhanādya sagaṇaṃ pāṇḍūnāṃ pravaraiḥ saha 08,006.042d*0075_04 phalgunaṃ sūdayiṣyāmi tvatpriyārthaṃ sabāndhavam

GE07mbh_08_u:597: 08,006.044a senāpatyena rādheyam abhiṣicya sutas tava 08,006.044c amanyata tadātmānaṃ kṛtārthaṃ
GE07mbh_08_u:599: 08,006.045c yogam ājñāpayām āsa sūryasyodayanaṃ prati 08,006.046a tava putrair vṛtaḥ karṇaḥ śuśubhe tatra bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:600: 08,006.046c devair iva yathā skandaḥ saṃgrāme tārakāmaye
GE07mbh_08_u:601: 08,007.001 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca 08,007.001a senāpatyaṃ tu saṃprāpya karṇo vaikartanas tadā
GE07mbh_08_u:602: 08,007.001c tathoktaś ca svayaṃ rājñā snigdhaṃ bhrātṛsamaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:604: 08,007.002b*0076_01 hitaś ca priyakāmaś ca mama putrasya nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:605: 08,007.002c akarot kiṃ mahāprājñas tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya
GE07mbh_08_u:606: 08,007.003 saṃjaya uvāca 08,007.003a karṇasya matam ājñāya putras te bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_08_u:608: 08,007.004a mahaty apararātre tu tava putrasya māriṣa
GE07mbh_08_u:609: 08,007.004c yogo yogeti sahasā prādurāsīn mahāsvanaḥ 08,007.005a nāgānāṃ kalpamānānāṃ rathānāṃ ca varūthinām 08,007.005c saṃnahyatāṃ padātīnāṃ vājināṃ ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_08_u:610: 08,007.006a krośatāṃ cāpi yodhānāṃ tvaritānāṃ parasparam 08,007.006c babhūva tumulaḥ śabdo divaspṛk sumahāṃs tadā
GE07mbh_08_u:618: 08,007.011a dṛṣṭvā karṇaṃ maheṣvāsaṃ rathasthaṃ rathināṃ varam
GE07mbh_08_u:619: 08,007.011c bhānumantam ivodyantaṃ tamo ghnantaṃ sahasraśaḥ 08,007.012a na bhīṣmavyasanaṃ ke cin nāpi droṇasya māriṣa
GE07mbh_08_u:620: 08,007.012c nānyeṣāṃ puruṣavyāghra menire tatra kauravāḥ 08,007.013a tatas tu tvarayan yodhāñ śaṅkhaśabdena māriṣa
GE07mbh_08_u:621: 08,007.013c karṇo niṣkāsayām āsa kauravāṇāṃ varūthinīm 08,007.014a vyūhaṃ vyūhya maheṣvāso mākaraṃ śatrutāpanaḥ 08,007.014b*0077_01 makaravyūham āsthāya daṃśito ravinandanaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:622: 08,007.014c pratyudyayau tadā karṇaḥ pāṇḍavān vijigīṣayā 08,007.015a makarasya tu tuṇḍe vai karṇo rājan vyavasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:623: 08,007.015c netrābhyāṃ śakuniḥ śūra ulūkaś ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:624: 08,007.016a droṇaputras tu śirasi grīvāyāṃ sarvasodarāḥ 08,007.016c madhye duryodhano rājā balena mahatā vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:625: 08,007.017a vāme pāde tu rājendra kṛtavarmā vyavasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:627: 08,007.018a pāde tu dakṣiṇe rājan gautamaḥ satyavikramaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:628: 08,007.018c trigartaiś ca maheṣvāsair dākṣiṇātyaiś ca saṃvṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:629: 08,007.019a anupādas tu yo vāmas tatra śalyo vyavasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:631: 08,007.020a dakṣiṇe tu mahārāja suṣeṇaḥ satyasaṃgaraḥ 08,007.020c vṛto rathasahasraiś ca dantināṃ ca śatais tathā
GE07mbh_08_u:632: 08,007.021a pucche āstāṃ mahāvīrau bhrātarau pārthivau tadā
GE07mbh_08_u:633: 08,007.021c citrasenaś ca citraś ca mahatyā senayā vṛtau
GE07mbh_08_u:634: 08,007.022a tataḥ prayāte rājendra karṇe naravarottame 08,007.022c dhanaṃjayam abhiprekṣya dharmarājo 'bravīd idam
GE07mbh_08_u:635: 08,007.023a paśya pārtha mahāsenāṃ dhārtarāṣṭrasya saṃyuge 08,007.023c karṇena nirmitāṃ vīra guptāṃ vīrair mahārathaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:636: 08,007.024a hatavīratamā hy eṣā dhārtarāṣṭrī mahācamūḥ 08,007.024c phalguśeṣā mahābāho tṛṇais tulyā matā mama
GE07mbh_08_u:637: 08,007.025a eko hy atra maheṣvāsaḥ sūtaputro vyavasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:638: 08,007.025c sadevāsuragandharvaiḥ sakiṃnaramahoragaiḥ 08,007.025e carācarais tribhir lokair yo 'jayyo rathināṃ varaḥ 08,007.026a taṃ hatvādya mahābāho vijayas tava phalguna
GE07mbh_08_u:639: 08,007.026c uddhṛtaś ca bhavec chalyo mama dvādaśavārṣikaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:640: 08,007.026e evaṃ jñātvā mahābāho vyūhaṃ vyūha yathecchasi
GE07mbh_08_u:641: 08,007.027a bhrātus tad vacanaṃ śrutvā pāṇḍavaḥ śvetavāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:642: 08,007.027c ardhacandreṇa vyūhena pratyavyūhata tāṃ camūm 08,007.028a vāmapārśve 'bhavad rājan bhīmaseno vyavasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:643: 08,007.028c dakṣiṇe ca maheṣvāso dhṛṣṭadyumno mahābalaḥ 08,007.029a madhye vyūhasya sākṣāt tu pāṇḍavaḥ kṛṣṇasārathiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:644: 08,007.029c nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca dharmarājaś ca pṛṣṭhataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:646: 08,007.030c nārjunaṃ jahatur yuddhe pālyamānau kirīṭinā 08,007.031a śeṣā nṛpatayo vīrāḥ sthitā vyūhasya daṃśitāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:647: 08,007.031c yathābhāvaṃ yathotsāhaṃ yathāsattvaṃ ca bhārata 08,007.032a evam etan mahāvyūhaṃ vyūhya bhārata pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:648: 08,007.032c tāvakāś ca maheṣvāsā yuddhāyaiva mano dadhuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:649: 08,007.033a dṛṣṭvā vyūḍhāṃ tava camūṃ sūtaputreṇa saṃyuge
GE07mbh_08_u:650: 08,007.033c nihatān pāṇḍavān mene tava putraḥ sahānvayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:651: 08,007.034a tathaiva pāṇḍavīṃ senāṃ vyūḍhāṃ dṛṣṭvā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:652: 08,007.034c dhārtarāṣṭrān hatān mene sakarṇān vai janādhipa
GE07mbh_08_u:653: 08,007.035a tataḥ śaṅkhāś ca bheryaś ca paṇavānakagomukhāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:655: 08,007.036a senayor ubhayo rājan prāvādyanta mahāsvanāḥ 08,007.036c siṃhanādaś ca saṃjajñe śūrāṇāṃ jayagṛddhinām 08,007.037a hayaheṣitaśabdāś ca vāraṇānāṃ ca bṛṃhitam 08,007.037c rathanemisvanāś cogrāḥ saṃbabhūvur janādhipa
GE07mbh_08_u:656: 08,007.038a na droṇavyasanaṃ kaś cij jānīte bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_08_u:657: 08,007.038c dṛṣṭvā karṇaṃ maheṣvāsaṃ mukhe vyūhasya daṃśitam
GE07mbh_08_u:659: 08,007.039c yoddhukāme sthite rājan hantum anyonyam añjasā
GE07mbh_08_u:660: 08,007.040a tatra yattau susaṃrabdhau dṛṣṭvānyonyaṃ vyavasthitau 08,007.040c anīkamadhye rājendra rejatuḥ karṇapāṇḍavau
GE07mbh_08_u:661: 08,007.041a nṛtyamāne tu te sene sameyātāṃ parasparam
GE07mbh_08_u:662: 08,007.041c tayoḥ pakṣaiḥ prapakṣaiś ca nirjagmur vai yuyutsavaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:664: 08,007.042c rathināṃ ca mahārāja anyonyaṃ nighnatāṃ dṛḍham
GE07mbh_08_u:665: 08,008.001 saṃjaya uvāca 08,008.001a te sene 'nyonyam āsādya prahṛṣṭāśvanaradvipe 08,008.001c bṛhatyau saṃprajahrāte devāsuracamūpame
GE07mbh_08_u:666: 08,008.002a tato gajā rathāś cāśvāḥ pattayaś ca mahāhave
GE07mbh_08_u:669: 08,008.003c uttamāṅgair nṛsiṃhānāṃ nṛsiṃhās tastarur mahīm 08,008.004a ardhacandrais tathā bhallaiḥ kṣuraprair asipaṭṭiśaiḥ 08,008.004c paraśvadhaiś cāpy akṛntann uttamāṅgāni yudhyatām 08,008.005a vyāyatāyatabāhūnāṃ vyāyatāyatabāhubhiḥ 08,008.005c vyāyatā bāhavaḥ petuś chinnamuṣṭyāyudhāṅgadāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:670: 08,008.006a taiḥ sphuradbhir mahī bhāti raktāṅgulitalais tadā
GE07mbh_08_u:671: 08,008.006c garuḍaprahatair ugraiḥ pañcāsyair iva pannagaiḥ 08,008.007a hayasyandananāgebhyaḥ petur vīrā dviṣaddhatāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:672: 08,008.007c vimānebhyo yathā kṣīṇe puṇye svargasadas tathā
GE07mbh_08_u:673: 08,008.008a gadābhir anyair gurvībhiḥ parighair musalair api
GE07mbh_08_u:674: 08,008.008c pothitāḥ śataśaḥ petur vīrā vīratarai raṇe
GE07mbh_08_u:675: 08,008.009a rathā rathair vinihatā mattā mattair dvipair dvipāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:676: 08,008.009c sādinaḥ sādibhiś caiva tasmin paramasaṃkule 08,008.010a rathā vararathair nāgair aśvārohāś ca pattibhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:677: 08,008.010c aśvārohaiḥ padātāś ca nihatā yudhi śerate
GE07mbh_08_u:678: 08,008.011a rathāśvapattayo nāgai rathair nāgāś ca pattayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:682: 08,008.012c pāṇipādaiś ca śastraiś ca rathaiś ca kadanaṃ mahat 08,008.013a tathā tasmin bale śūrair vadhyamāne hate 'pi ca
GE07mbh_08_u:684: 08,008.014a dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ śikhaṇḍī ca draupadeyāḥ prabhadrakāḥ 08,008.014c sātyakiś cekitānaś ca draviḍaiḥ sainikaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_08_u:685: 08,008.015a bhṛtā vittena mahatā pāṇḍyāś cauḍrāḥ sakeralāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:693: 08,008.019c karūṣāḥ kosalāḥ kāśyā māgadhāś cāpi dudruvuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:694: 08,008.020a teṣāṃ rathāś ca nāgāś ca pravarāś cāpi pattayaḥ 08,008.020c nānāvidharavair hṛṣṭā nṛtyanti ca hasanti ca
GE07mbh_08_u:695: 08,008.021a tasya sainyasya mahato mahāmātravarair vṛtaḥ 08,008.021c madhyaṃ vṛkodaro 'bhyāgāt tvadīyaṃ nāgadhūrgataḥ 08,008.022a sa nāgapravaro 'tyugro vidhivat kalpito babhau
GE07mbh_08_u:699: 08,008.024c caran madhyaṃdinārkābhas tejasā vyadahad ripūn 08,008.025a taṃ dṛṣṭvā dviradaṃ dūrāt kṣemadhūrtir dvipasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:700: 08,008.025c āhvayāno 'bhidudrāva pramanāḥ pramanastaram 08,008.026a tayoḥ samabhavad yuddhaṃ dvipayor ugrarūpayoḥ 08,008.026c yadṛcchayā drumavator mahāparvatayor iva
GE07mbh_08_u:701: 08,008.027a saṃsaktanāgau tau vīrau tomarair itaretaram 08,008.027c balavat sūryaraśmyābhair bhittvā bhittvā vinedatuḥ 08,008.028a vyapasṛtya tu nāgābhyāṃ maṇḍalāni viceratuḥ 08,008.028c pragṛhya caiva dhanuṣī jaghnatur vai parasparam
GE07mbh_08_u:703: 08,008.029c tau janān harṣayitvā ca siṃhanādān pracakratuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:704: 08,008.030a samudyatakarābhyāṃ tau dvipābhyāṃ kṛtināv ubhau 08,008.030c vātoddhūtapatākābhyāṃ yuyudhāte mahābalau
GE07mbh_08_u:705: 08,008.031a tāv anyonyasya dhanuṣī chittvānyonyaṃ vinedatuḥ 08,008.031c śaktitomaravarṣeṇa prāvṛṇmeghāv ivāmbubhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:706: 08,008.032a kṣemadhūrtis tadā bhīmaṃ tomareṇa stanāntare 08,008.032c nirbibheda tu vegena ṣaḍbhiś cāpy aparair nadan
GE07mbh_08_u:707: 08,008.033a sa bhīmasenaḥ śuśubhe tomarair aṅgamāśritaiḥ 08,008.033c krodhadīptavapur meghaiḥ saptasaptir ivāṃśumān
GE07mbh_08_u:709: 08,008.034c sasarja tomaraṃ bhīmaḥ pratyamitrāya yatnavān 08,008.035a tataḥ kulūtādhipatiś cāpam āyamya sāyakaiḥ 08,008.035c daśabhis tomaraṃ chittvā śaktyā vivyādha pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_08_u:711: 08,008.036c ripor abhyardayan nāgam unmadaḥ pāṇḍavaḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:712: 08,008.037a sa śaraughārdito nāgo bhīmasenena saṃyuge 08,008.037c nigṛhyamāṇo nātiṣṭhad vātadhvasta ivāmbudaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:713: 08,008.038a tām abhyadhāvad dviradaṃ bhīmasenasya nāgarāṭ 08,008.038c mahāvāteritaṃ meghaṃ vātoddhūta ivāmbudaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:717: 08,008.040c chittvā śarāsanaṃ śatror nāgam āmitram ārdayat
GE07mbh_08_u:718: 08,008.041a tataḥ khajākayā bhīmaṃ kṣemadhūrtiḥ parābhinat 08,008.041c jaghāna cāsya dviradaṃ nārācaiḥ sarvamarmasu 08,008.041d*0079_01 sa papāta mahānago bhīmasenasya bhārata 08,008.042a purā nāgasya patanād avaplutya sthito mahīm
GE07mbh_08_u:719: 08,008.042c bhīmaseno ripor nāgaṃ gadayā samapothayat 08,008.043a tasmāt pramathitān nāgāt kṣemadhūrtim avadrutam 08,008.043b*0080_01 uddhṛtya khaḍgaṃ niśitam abhyadhāvat sa pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_08_u:721: 08,008.044a sa papāta hataḥ sāsir vyasuḥ svam abhito dvipam 08,008.044c vajraprarugṇam acalaṃ siṃho vajrahato yathā 08,008.045a nihataṃ nṛpatiṃ dṛṣṭvā kulūtānāṃ yaśaskaram 08,008.045c prādravad vyathitā senā tvadīyā bharatarṣabha 08,009.001 saṃjaya uvāca 08,009.001a tataḥ karṇo maheṣvāsaḥ pāṇḍavānām anīkinīm 08,009.001c jaghāna samare śūraḥ śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ 08,009.002a tathaiva pāṇḍavā rājaṃs tava putrasya vāhinīm
GE07mbh_08_u:722: 08,009.002c karṇasya pramukhe kruddhā vinijaghnur mahārathāḥ 08,009.003a karṇo rājan mahābāhur nyavadhīt pāṇḍavīṃ camūm
GE07mbh_08_u:724: 08,009.004a tatra bhārata karṇena nārācais tāḍitā gajāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:725: 08,009.004c neduḥ seduś ca mamluś ca babhramuś ca diśo daśa
GE07mbh_08_u:726: 08,009.005a vadhyamāne bale tasmin sūtaputreṇa māriṣa 08,009.005c nakulo 'bhyadravat tūrṇaṃ sūtaputraṃ mahāraṇe
GE07mbh_08_u:727: 08,009.006a bhīmasenas tathā drauṇiṃ kurvāṇaṃ karma duṣkaram
GE07mbh_08_u:731: 08,009.008a duryodhanas tu rājānaṃ dharmaputraṃ yudhiṣṭhiram 08,009.008c saṃśaptakagaṇān kruddho abhyadhāvad dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:732: 08,009.009a dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ kṛpaṃ cātha tasmin vīravarakṣaye 08,009.009c śikhaṇḍī kṛtavarmāṇaṃ samāsādayad acyutam
GE07mbh_08_u:733: 08,009.010a śrutakīrtis tathā śalyaṃ mādrīputraḥ sutaṃ tava
GE07mbh_08_u:735: 08,009.011a kekayau sātyakiṃ yuddhe śaravarṣeṇa bhāsvatā 08,009.011c sātyakiḥ kekayau caiva chādayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:736: 08,009.012a tāv enaṃ bhrātarau vīraṃ jaghnatur hṛdaye bhṛśam
GE07mbh_08_u:737: 08,009.012c viṣāṇābhyāṃ yathā nāgau pratināgaṃ mahāhave 08,009.013a śarasaṃbhinnavarmāṇau tāv ubhau bhrātarau raṇe 08,009.013c sātyakiṃ satyakarmāṇaṃ rājan vivyadhatuḥ śaraiḥ 08,009.014a tau sātyakir mahārāja prahasan sarvatodiśam 08,009.014c chādayañ śaravarṣeṇa vārayām āsa bhārata 08,009.015a vāryamāṇau tatas tau tu śaineyaśaravṛṣṭibhiḥ 08,009.015c śaineyasya rathaṃ tūrṇaṃ chādayām āsatuḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:738: 08,009.016a tayos tu dhanuṣī citre chittvā śaurir mahāhave
GE07mbh_08_u:739: 08,009.016c atha tau sāyakais tīkṣṇaiś chādayām āsa duḥsahaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:740: 08,009.017a athānye dhanuṣī mṛṣṭe pragṛhya ca mahāśarān
GE07mbh_08_u:741: 08,009.017c sātyakiṃ pūrayantau tau ceratur laghu suṣṭhu ca
GE07mbh_08_u:743: 08,009.018c dyotayanto diśaḥ sarvāḥ saṃpetuḥ svarṇabhūṣaṇāḥ 08,009.019a bāṇāndhakāram abhavat tayo rājan mahāhave 08,009.019c anyonyasya dhanuś caiva cicchidus te mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:744: 08,009.019d*0081_01 sātvatasya dhanus tatra ubhau cicchidatū raṇe
GE07mbh_08_u:745: 08,009.020a tataḥ kruddho mahārāja sātvato yuddhadurmadaḥ 08,009.020c dhanur anyat samādāya sajyaṃ kṛtvā ca saṃyuge
GE07mbh_08_u:746: 08,009.020d*0082_01 anumṛjya ca rājendra tad dhanur bhārasādhanam
GE07mbh_08_u:748: 08,009.021a tacchiro nyapatad bhūmau kuṇḍalotpīḍitaṃ mahat 08,009.021c śambarasya śiro yadvan nihatasya mahāraṇe 08,009.021e śoṣayan kekayān sarvāñ jagāmāśu vasuṃdharām 08,009.022a taṃ dṛṣṭvā nihataṃ śūraṃ bhrātā tasya mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:749: 08,009.022c sajyam anyad dhanuḥ kṛtvā śaineyaṃ pratyavārayat
GE07mbh_08_u:750: 08,009.023a sa śaktyā sātyakiṃ viddhvā svarṇapuṅkhaiḥ śilāśitaiḥ

GE07mbh_08_u:1000: 08,012.063c bāṇāndhakāraṃ sahasaiva kṛtvā; vivyādha sarvān iṣubhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:1002: 08,012.064a nāpy ādadat saṃdadhan naiva muñcan; bāṇān raṇe 'dṛśyata
GE07mbh_08_u:1004: 08,012.064c hatāṃś ca nāgāṃs turagān padātīn; saṃsyūtadehān dadṛśū rathāṃś

GE07mbh_08_u:1019: 08,012.068d*0098_01 sa tair hṛto vātajavais turaṃgair 08,012.068d*0098_02 drauṇir dṛḍhaṃ
GE07mbh_08_u:1020: 08,012.069a āvṛtya neyeṣa punas tu yuddhaṃ; pārthena sārdhaṃ matimān

GE07mbh_08_u:1049: apy alaṃkṛtam 08,013.011c punar niyantṝn saha pādagoptṛbhis; tatas tu cukrodha

GE07mbh_08_u:1059: 08,013.014c tathā cakāśe niśi parvato yathā; davāgninā prajvalitauṣadhidrumaḥ 08,013.015a sa vedanārto 'mbudanisvano nadaṃś; calan bhraman praskhalito

GE07mbh_08_u:1069: 08,013.020a atha dvipaṃ śvetanagāgrasaṃnibhaṃ; divākarāṃśupratimaiḥ śarottamaiḥ 08,013.020c bibheda pārthaḥ sa papāta nānadan; himādrikūṭaḥ kuliśāhato yathā
